HomePage.description: Since 2019, I have dedicated myself with great passion to the world of programming. Throughout this journey, I have honed my skills in various languages, including JavaScript, jQuery, React, HTML-CSS, React Next, and TypeScript.
HomePage.educationDescription: Bachelor of Software Engineering with a focus on web development. Proficient in creating dynamic and responsive websites, designing user-friendly interfaces, and optimizing for performance.
HomePage.learningTitle: Keen to learn and keep up-to-date
HomePage.learningDescription: As a dedicated and results-oriented professional, I am committed to delivering innovative solutions that exceed client expectations. I am always eager to learn new technologies and apply them to improve project outcomes.
HomePage.workExperienceDescription1: Front-end Development Role at Akam Software: Held the position of front-end developer for 8 months, contributing to the development of multiple websites and web applications.
HomePage.workExperienceDescription2: Front-end Development Role at Resam Anahitha: Held the position of front-end developer at Resam Anahitha since September 2023, contributing to the development of an ERP system with modules such as production, office automation, and inventory.
